comment: Smart Data Models  - Transportation / RestrictedTrafficArea adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.Transportation/master/RestrictedTrafficArea/schema.json
description: An area of a city in which the traffic generated by cars or any other kind of vehicles is subjected to limitation.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: regulation
contents.comment: A URL pointing to the regulation for the specific restricted traffic area.

contents.name: restrictionValidityHours
contents.comment: Days of the week and hours in which the traffic restriction is active.

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: validityEndDate
contents.comment: The date at which the restriction is dismissed.

contents.name: validityStartDate
contents.comment: The date from which the restriction is applied.

contents.name: category
contents.comment: Restricted traffic area's category(ies). The purpose of this field is to allow to tag, generally speaking, restricted traffic area entities. Particularities and detailed descriptions should be found under the corresponding specific attributes.

contents.name: notAllowedVehicleType
contents.comment: Vehicle type(s) not allowed to cross the restricted traffic area.

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: restrictionExceptions
contents.comment: Individual vehicle type allowed to cross the restricted traffic area in a specific time slot.

contents.name: security
contents.comment: Security aspects provided by this restricted traffic area.

contents.name: specialRestrictions
contents.comment: Individual vehicle type not allowed to cross the restricted traffic area in a specific time slot.
